TextBlock.Text: SENNETTI: Goodness, Okalis was not lying when he remarked on the terrible beast in this area. That anglerfish is massive!
SENNETTI: Fortunately, it seems the creature is thoroughly domesticated, so it should be no real threat. From what I can gather, this fish is the mother of all others domesticated by the Dree.
SENNETTI: From the size of it, it must consume a massive quantity of food just to sustain itself. Even with its sedentary lifestyle, I suspect it would starve if the Dree did not feed it.
